params._maxBackers: Maximum number of backers for this tier
params._minAmount: Minimum contribution amount for this tier

params._voteForExtension: True if voting for deadline extension
params._voteForRelease: True if voting for fund release

claimERC20Refund(address).notice: Claim ERC20 token refund if campaign failed

claimReward().notice: Claim reward for a successful campaign

contributeERC20(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Contribute ERC20 tokens to the campaign

requestWithdrawal().notice: Withdraw funds if campaign is successful

vote(bool,bool).notice: Vote for campaign extension and fund release
